attributes.action: represent the severe trauma of a British Citizen assaulted/attacked and then detained at Police Station in India upon frivolous complaint of his Assailant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 16/06/2009 a British Citizen was assaulted/attacked along with his 76 year old mother and while the Assailant's accomplices forcibly detained him the Assailant rushed to the local Jadavpur police station, Kolkata, India and influenced the police to pick up his British Citizen victim within minutes leaving his assaulted 76 year mother devastatingly on the road.The Indian police detaining him for 3 hours did not allow Consular Contact/Assistance or any basic human rights consideration for a diabetic. Till today the Assailants are publicly at large.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Foreign Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
